name: Sweet Soy-Garlic Dipping Sauce
description: [Photographs: J. Kenji Lopez-Alt] Update your fried chicken with these no-cook dipping sauces in under 7 minutes » About the author: J. Kenji Lopez-Alt is the Managing Editor of Serious Eats where he likes to explore the science of home...
recipeIngredient: 3 medium cloves of garlic, grated on a microplane grater (about 3 teaspoons)

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk all ingredients together in a small bowl until sugar is dissolved. Serve with fried chicken.
